A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Massive disappointment. I'm a big Rian Johnson fan. Brick is a classic and Looper was great. So I had hopes that he would be able to overcome all the shortcomings of JJ Abrams' highly derivative and unoriginal The Force Awakens. \n\nUnfortunately\, it doesn't. Not only that\, but there are entire storylines that are pointless and have no effect on the outcome of the story. Every hope I had for this story was shattered.  Now I'm not even sure I want to watch Episode 9.
